characterDescription:
Ulim is a Voidspren sent by Odium to assist Venli, who feels threatened by him, thinking that he should obey her, rather than that she should obey him.
He ignores her, which further stokes her anger.

characterDetails.Appearance:
He usually takes the form of rolling lightning, moving across surfaces. At the bottom, he forms from lightning into a human shape with odd eyes.*
He has long hair that ripples in an unseen wind.
His red figure can appear electrified.
characterDetails.Notes:
*Venli isn't at all certain why a spren sent by Odium himself would look human.
According to Brandon, Ulim is an evil spren.
